about_the_game:
Take flight to the Griffin Palace! Grab this tileset to make a moody underground lair or a sunlight sky shrine.

This Griffin Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water in blue and purple
Light, fluffy clouds for that high-in-the-sky ambiance
Dark and light marble ground tiles
Gold tiles – add a touch of richness to your palace with bright gold bricks, plus a matching detailed gold border!
2 matching spike traps

Walls:

Dark walls, light walls, detailed and and brick…make your palace dark and mysterious or bright and airy. Four roof tiles included.

Stairs:

North-south stairs to match all floors!

Also featuring:

small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
skylight window (small and large)
treasure box
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues
magic rings
elegant sashes and gold details
diagonal stairs
ladders
plus more!

Events and Animations

Treasure chest and various fire animations for torches!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
